text: Tried for over a month to get it to connect to wifi.... it won’t. It finally connected to Bluetooth so it works if I’m home but I don’t have any control over my “smart lock” when I leave. This is my second device and same issue. Wifi works with literally everything else, even things further from the modem than the front door is.

title: Technical dumpster fire
text: Of my entire house of smart home devices, the Schlage WiFi adapters (which require this app) are the only nightmare. It takes multiple tries to get the adapters to connect. The app is so incredibly slow (even on ultra-high speed networks) that the adapters time out looking for the app to connect. This app is the single reason that I’ll be replacing all of my Schlage locks soon. Been using these for years now and anytime we need to change the WiFi name, it’s a giant mess with these.

title: Extra set of security
text: The lock works great but I really like the App. The functions and capabilities it provides help me have a sense of security. The App gives me the ability to control and monitor what happens with my door. I will always have a Schlage lock at my house!!

title: Clunky
text:
Trying to set up and it says “turn Bluetooth on to continue with this step”. Bluetooth is on. Reset phone. Toggled Bluetooth. Reinstalled app. Still saying it.

Update: User error. Have to go into settings then Schlage app and allow Bluetooth access.

title: Forgets password
text: The app works great, while keeping me signed. At least one a month I randomly have to log back in to the app. I don’t access the password from anywhere else, I don’t accept a random hard to remember password since my phone should remember it and keep me connected, but once a month I have to reset my password randomly.

title: Just WoW
text: Best lock ever. Notifications every time the door is accessed, permanent and temp access codes for granting access to place, 100 key codes available. Manual key backup, can set and monitor from phone app. Amazing product! I plan on getting more for my other properties.

title: Extremely effective
text: This lock gives instantaneous feedback directly to your phone sending a notification every time it is locked or unlocked! I’m definitely going to be replacing all my deadbolt locks with this lock!

title: OK once it works - a big pain to setup/connect to WiFi
text: Documentation on this WiFi adapter is pretty pathetic, and Schlage tech support closed - luckily, a lot of other people have had the same problems on connecting to their routers/WiFi - their instructions finally got me able to use this device (but remote connection to the lock is incredibly SLOW)

title: Door sensor syncs and longer auto lock timer
text:
First we need to have door sensors that can be synced with the lock so it knows the door is open or closed. And we should have more options for auto lock I would like an option of 30 and 45 minutes added also the 4 minutes is not even enough time to bring groceries inside
Both are really simple fix and  2 to 5 star

title: Read closely
text: I bought the Schlage smart sense lock thinking I could unlock/lock the door from anywhere but you need to buy $60 WiFi adapter. If the lock can talk to a WiFi adapter why can’t it be added to my WiFi network directly like nest or WiFi light bulbs? Sounds like a scam to get you to buy more of their products. Other than that I like the lock

title: Excellent product
text: This is such an easy way to handle temporary access to your home for home repair people, short-term renters and other such people, when you are not there. No lost keys or need for re-keying between tenants. So easy to use and convenient!

title: Piece of crap
text:
Worked occasionally before this update. Now will not work with Siri on iPhone or iPad. Schlage should be embarrassed!

Update: I called Schlage customer service and an agent walked me through resetting the pairing of the lock and app. It now works well with siri again. Hope the problem does not reappear after the next update. Still love the lock!

title: Love this device!
text: I love the features of this lock.  Installation was a snap.  Highly recommend this product.  It also looks very nice on the front of my house.  I am very pleased.  It was recommended by a local lock shop and I am now a Schlage customer for life!

title: Issues with HomeKit
text: Still having issues for about a year where it won’t unlock with Siri command, I bought 2 locks an both are the problem , I contacted apple and said Schlage still had not updated to a version that will avoid this issues

title: Randomly unreachable
text: I installed 4 locks and all went smoothly. All were responding to the app controls and through Siri. I open the app an hour later (WiFi and Bluetooth on) and 2 of the locks are unreachable. A little bit later I open the app again and those 2 locks are now reachable but the other 2 locks are not. I checked the app several more times randomly and anywhere between 1 and all 4 would be unreachable. No rhyme or reason. It’s really annoying and disappointing considering I spent over $800

title: Unable to pair - RESOLVED
text: Christine worked with us to help resolve problems in pairing our new keypad lock.  She did a fantastic job of helping us work through the issue with an amazing amount of patience.  We really like the keypad lock and recommend it.

title: App lost after latest IOs
text: Unable to create new pin codes and save them ever since IOs updated. Tried deleting and reinstalling on 3 different devices. Been over a week now, customer hotline is either a forever hold or hangs up after a recording. If a developer is listening, please shine a light on current status, thanks.

title: What happened?
text: Was a great app at 5 stars until this last update and now not tracking history activity accurately if at all.  Getting no notices or history and at other times getting notices of unlocked standing right next to it clearly still locked.

title: 4.2.2 Bug prevents create, edit and delete of access codes
text: Great product but since 4.2.2 we have not been able to create, edit or delete access codes. Have reloaded app, reset lock and read user guides with no luck. Please help!

title: Very disappointed
text: We have had the encode for about one month. We have 1GB internet speed and a mesh router whole house system. This lock will not stay connected to  our network and constantly fails. We have to try to reconnect manually to the point of frustration. We have not been able to use the door at times as it would not work electronically or manually. Literally a terrible experience with Encode!! Schlage, this is a fail for you!

title: Customer Service
text: I had totally screwed up the installation of the programmable features on the lock. I called Customer Service. I was given A+ direction on how to properly set up the lock. I wish I remembered her name but she’s in Kansas and did a great job

title: Great
text: Since I have gotten this it’s been one of the most convenient door locks I have used, before I got it I’ve used 3 to 4 different apps and systems and by far this is the most convenient easy to use one I’ve had so far

title: Very difficult !
text:
Worked at getting the hub connected to my WiFi for quite a while 
Finally got it to connect after defaulting the hub
Then I couldn’t get the lock recognized by the hub even though it was available before I got the hub connected 
Removed the battery pack from the lock reinstalled the battery pack and then the lock appeared 
Now I don’t see the lock when on the local WiFi but it works when connected by LTE connection

title: Secure
text: So easy to program.  Granted I didn’t install the lock but, it didn’t look difficult it took maybe 15 minutes to install the locks and 5 min or less to program depending on wifi strength!

title: Customer Service
text: The customer service was superb. Had trouble with my lock and it took a half hour to resolve and the customer service rep. stayed with me walking me thru all the issues I created and fixed them all. Great job. Thanks Joe

title: Not Zwave
text: Do not understand how I made this mistake, but this control is strictly Bluetooth - unless you buy the additional wifi plug adapter for $50 or more.  Most everything you read says it is compatible with Samsung smarthings hub, but I wasted so much time trying to pair this. Finally downloaded the Schlage app & used bluetooth. Works fine but also wanted smarthings.

title: Takes time
text: It takes time to find the lock when the app has not been used recently. It often also asks for a resign in, fine but I don’t always have internet to sign into the account.  Once in, internet is not needed.

title: Blessing
text: Having the ability to lock and unlock my door remotely is a blessing because I have limited mobility. Haven’t used the feature of scheduling and assigning codes but look forward to having that capability.

title: I love it
text: This lock is very easy to use, specially changing the access codes, it works great with the WIFI. You will need a little bit of patience when you installing it for the first time; just follow all the instructions.

title: Need battery life indication
text: Great app, works well, but it would be helpful if you could see the remaining battery life when the little red low battery indicator shows in the upper right corner. It could even just be a a number next to it - say, 12% - or else a graph in one of the menus.

title: How about a dashboard widget?
text: App works well as far as it goes, we have used with direct Bluetooth connection as well as WiFi adapter. Having a widget available to quickly access the lock/unlock function from the iPhone home screen without having to open the app would be a home run.

title: Great app
text: I think it’s a great and effective app. I do wish they would allow for a schedule to happen. For example, I can make sure that the door is locked at midnight every night. That’s my only request.

title: All good wish there was more programming...
text: Love the WiFi feature and the notices but I wish you could set temporary codes like some of the other lock systems allow.  You have to remember to go in and delete a user once they are done.  For our use it’s a bit of a hassle.  The lock and the system work great otherwise.

title: Please add more features
text: I wish the app had the ability to know when you close to the lock and automatically unlocks it for you. Also I wish it had some kind of lights at night coz I get home when it’s dark and I can’t see the numbers.

title: Bugs after last update
text: Recent update bugs: unable to schedule temporary lock codes. Glitches when entering dates and times and cannot complete. Please fix quickly because this feature is mandatory for short term rental units.

title: Great App
text: App works great - have had no issues :) Would make one suggestion - I’d have given 5 stars if I could do more with the app such as scheduling lock or unlock times. The delay auto lock is just not convenient. I now use a separate app to schedule an auto lock or unlock.

title: Easy setup. Glad I purchased this lock.
text: Easy install when I replaced an older model Schlege keypad deadbolt. Just finished setting up the lock with the iPhone app. Ran it through a battery of user tests. Passed all my expectations with flying colors.

title: Great lock but...
text: It needs a better interface. A modern intuitive interface that is well built. With that said an I watch app and Siri integration for my encode lock. HomeKit integration would be great too. If I could link with my Adt alarm it would be a slam dunk.

title: Easy
text: Great flexibility and usability. I enjoy setting up access for family members and neighbors when the take care of our pet. The notifications are here at as well alerting the accesses. Really glad we went with Schlage.

title: Works as advertised
text: Couldn’t be happier that we went with this lock. Does everything it said it would do. Never have to run around the house at night checking locks.

title: Easy install
text: The app is amazing makes everything easy to where everybody can have their own codes on their own phone the best part is I don’t have to worry about keys getting lost any more

title: Easy easy easy
text: This lock and app are easy. Installed on the back door because it’s dark and unlocking the back door at night was inconvenient but now, I park, use the app to unlock and walk...easy easy easy

title: Sense lock installed
text: Lock is in and works great.  Little confusing how the original access codes won’t function after you install the app but if you follow the steps pretty easy to figure out

title: Very impressed
text: Schlage has made a solid product. Easy to add and subtract codes. Easy to lock and unlock from remote location. The system options are appropriately accessible and I can’t think of any additional options I would want. Good job Schlage.

title: Needs some improvement
text:
Suggestions:
1) it requires a login randomly - that’s annoying.
2) the user list should reflect which users are currently enabled - maybe with color codes?
3) the user access option should have a “disable” option without deleting the user.

title: It only works if I’m standing right by my door
text: This claims that you can check to see if you think you may have locked the door or not if you’re away. I can try to check and see - and the history of who has been coming in and out while you’re away. Nope. To test it I went to another part of my house and it didn’t pick anything up. Nope. I mean the lock itself is great, but this remote app is kinda iffy.

title: Keyless not what I thought
text: Keyless entry more than I expected none of the challenges I thought that I would have negatively fearful of hacking and things of that nature but no longer concern as the system has built-in safeguards and alarms

title: Love the lock
text: I love the lock. Makes life so much easier. Don’t have to fiddle with keys while carrying in bags from the store or take out. But the app will not update. I tried the day I installed it and have many times since. No luck. But it still opens correctly and works with my Apple home, so I won’t worry about it for now.

title: Perfect Perfect!!
text: The most convenient part of getting home & it happens to be raining!! We don’t have a garage, so we enter into our home directly from the elements!! So this is so convenient!! Great quality build & product!!

title: Papa
text: I just bought this lock today. It was very easy to install and program. The app was also very easy to set up I would recommend this lock to other.

title: Elite lock
text: Bought this kick cause a relative just bought it and likes it.  We have had it for under two months and then it wouldn’t open the other night when my husband came home. We are trying to reprogram it and having issues.  For now using the emergency keys.  Shouldn’t stop working so quickly.  And it was not the battery.

title: The best!
text: We tried less expensive brands and they broke during installation or just plain didn't work.  This one installed get simply and set up via phone was slick.  Well worth the extra money.

title: Complete control
text: Being able to control my locks& door from my phone  is what I call,” complete control”!!! It is the best thing since fresh bread,& I recommend it  in every way to every human in existence!!!!!

title: Help with Schladge Home App.
text: I worked with 2 wonderful young ladies to reset my Schladg digital lock. I found out my Schladge Home app was corrupted. They helped me dump and reload the app on my I phone. I reset all of my key codes an everything works great now. Dennis Reynard from Tierra Verde, FL

title: Waste of money
text: The app and the $300 lock are a waste of money. It let me put in 2 passcodes but won’t let me revise or edit them, won’t let me delete them, or add new ones. DEAD in the water. A total waste of $300 for the dumbest “smart” lock out there. And forget customer support - Schlage is worried about Lowe’s and Home Depot, not is customers. I spent 3 hrs on hold to be told to delete the app and reinstall - and then was mysteriously cut off and dropped call. Pathetic excuse for service.

title: Way too easy
text: The installation of our Encode system was quick and effortless. The software set-up worked exactly as expected and the intuitive aspect of the app has been flawless.

title: My only issue
text: My only issue is that it sends notification throughout my sleep that my door has been unlocked, and I jump out my sleep to see that my door is still very much closed & locked. I go to the history and the history lists isn’t matched with the notifications that are still very much there on my lock screen saying my door has been unlocked how much ever minutes ago. It’s creepy.

title: Battery Life
text: It would be helpful if the app provided battery status since we have more than one lock. Since we rarely “key in” from the back door we don’t see the indications on the key pad. Batteries went dead before we realized it.

title: Frustrating
text: Very disappointed after a good start. Lock initially worked well but I installed a new WiFi network which the adapter will not connect to when going through the proper change steps. It keeps telling me my phone is on a different network, which after verifying, it is not. Furthermore, I replaced the batteries in the deadbolt and now the majority of the codes don’t work and I have no way to access them.

title: Excellent Lock
text: I’m very pleased with the Schlage Application features. It’s very easy to use, it tracks and logs all entry’s. I’ve not tried the unlock feature from another area for like the delivery man or a friend or family member visiting.

title: Latest Update
text:
I have had the lock “Encode” over a year without any issues. Lately the lock became unconnected & after restarting, it will no longer connect to the wifi. 

I manually hard reset lock several times, reset router, & checked to make sure it’s on 2.4gh connection, still will not connect to wifi. 

Please help…

title: Great Quality, Easy Install
text: Great quality, seamless integration, easy installation.  App was intuitive and I was completely up and running in 30 minutes - which included boring my solid core door for the new Schlage Encode!

title: Great when it works — latest update broke my setup.
text: Odd that the latest update was to fix an error about not finding locks, when that’s the exact error I get *after* it auto updated. It’s at a vacation home so I can’t drop everything and run to the coast to go through setup *again*.

title: Love the convenience
text: We had a different key pad lock and hated it. It was a push button and no wireless app. We had problems with it not working, especially in the winter. This one works great. We haven’t had it in the winter yet. But so far, love it and it works great.

title: Exactly What I wanted
text: Easy to use, notifies me right away when someone has access my door, easy to install and gives me peace of mind when my kids arrive home from school.

title: App was fine until...
text: The app was working great and reliable until I updated my software to iOS 13.0.1. Now it says it can’t find the lock and it’s for our vacation home so it’s not like I can jump in the car to fix it being 3 hours away. Doesn’t seem reliable.

title: Fantastic
text: I am not mechanically gifted but it is so easy to install.  I did call technical support and they were so friendly and helpful.  I have now installed 2 Encodes and have 2 more to install.  Fantastic experience

title: Love everything about the products
text: I bought the Schlage Encode. Super easy to install and I love the app where I can control/verify the deadbolt is engaged.  Seriously could not be happier, nor feel safer that my home is secure!

title: Full function
text: I really love having Schlage products in my home to help protect my family. I don’t like that I cannot reach someone when I need technical support. The phone just rings or I’m kept on hold and never talk to anyone. I have sent emails messages, but no one has ever return my calls or respond to my messages. Great products, horrible service.

title: Schlage takes door locks to the highest level
text: Easy to install... all work brilliantly from my smart phone. Provides peace of mind while away and construction personnel access with my knowledge only. Way to go Schlage!

title: Schlage App
text: Works well with Schlage Encode locks.  I would have rated the App 5 stars if it had a scheduling function.
